attributes.action: Stop the influx of illegal immigrants coming over on the boats.
attributes.additional_details: Stop the influx of illegal immigrants coming over on the boats. (As most of them do not add or benefit tlhe country. Also some are a danger too public and national safety. Assome of them which allowed to roam free on our streets are wanted criminals back where they came from)
attributes.background: Stop the influx of illegal immigrants coming over on the boats. The navy couod return them all safely back to france

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744
